title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\TransformationLocation
name: TransformationLocation
description:
Specifies the location of a transformation.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.TransformationLocation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.finding_id
params.description: For infotype transformations, link to the corresponding findings ID so that location information does not need to be duplicated. Each findings ID correlates to an entry in the findings output table, this table only gets created when users specify to save findings (add the save findings action to the request).

params.name: data.record_transformation
params.description: For record transformations, provide a field and container information.

params.name: data.container_type
params.description: Information about the functionality of the container where this finding occurred, if available.
